de.javanarior.utils.lang.reflect

Class Invoker

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.javanarior.utils.lang.reflect.Invoker

  • public final class Invoker
extends Object
    Reflection Invocation helper.

      • invokeConstructor

        public static <T> T invokeConstructor(Class<T> toInstanciate,
                      Class<?>[] argumentTypes,
                      Object[] argument)
        Invoke the constructor from toInstanciate with the parameter specified by parameterTypes and provides parameterValues as parameters.
        Parameters:
        toInstanciate - - class object from which a new instance is to be created
        argumentTypes - - the parameter types of the constructor to use
        argument - - the values to pass to the constructor
        Returns:
        a new instance of toInstanciate
